_header: Caton says that soothfast thing is
_description: General Prologue to the Scottish Legendary

CULGg26.First Lines:
Catone sais þat suthfaste thing isþat Idilnes giffis
                    novrysingis…
CULGg26.Last Lines:
…for petir prince wes of þame allat apostulis now we
                    call
